Summary: clear night, bright orange object with red aura hoovered then quickly disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to get dog approximately 9:45pm on very clear night . Out in field next to our property above the tree line approximately 2 football fields away was a large glowing orange object with the red aura floating then very quickly disappearing leaving a light path. Ran quickly inside, locking my doors, very upset.
